title: This Windows Update Pop-Up Is a Scam
description: It's actually a ClickFix attack that delivers malware to your computer.

title: From JPMorgan-branded beer foam to gym views, TikToks are revealing details of the bank's 270 Park headquarters
description: Videos on TikTok of what appear to be the building's interior show floor-to-ceiling windows, rows of cardio machines, and branded beer.

title: Microsoft doesn't understand the dislike for Windows' new direction
description: You don't need to ask them twice.

title: Microsoft Will Preload Windows 11 File Explorer to Fix Bad Performance
description: Hello Windows Insiders, today we are releasing Windows 11 Insider Preview Build 26220.7271 (KB5070307) to the Dev & Beta Channels.
